8.title: Welcome
8.text:
Credence is an extremely powerful Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme.

This demo as with all the others is available for single click importing.

[sh_btn link="https://www.mojomarketplace.com/item/credence-a-wonderful-multi-purpose-wordpress-theme?r=scripthat-9VHodxN2Fh" target="_self" shape="square" style="flat" size="large" color="rgba(0,0,0,0)" bordercolor="#ffffff" bordersize="2" fontcolor="rgb(246, 242, 242)" enablehover="enable" enableicon="enable" iconbg="flat" icon=" fa fa-fire"]Purchase Today[/sh_btn]

11.title: Add Your Own Content
11.text:
This slide down option (like the footer widget) can be enabled or disabled, you can set your font, link, and background colors independently of other sections, and you can configure it to be 1 to 4 columns. Add any widget you would like, shortcodes or even custom html!
